subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
lead_paragraph: After a bitter 149-day lockout that consumed the summer and fall, the N.B.A. exceeded expectations in every area this season, from revenue to ratings to attendance.
snippet: After a bitter 149-day lockout that consumed the summer and fall, the N.B.A. exceeded expectations in every area this season, from revenue to ratings to attendance.
